required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Compare the Efficacy of SEL-212 to KRYSTEXXA® in Gout Patients Refractory to Conventional Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Compare the Efficacy of SEL-212 to KRYSTEXXA® in Gout Patients Refractory to Conventional Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, parallel-arm, multicenter study to compare the safety and efficacy profiles of SEL-212 and KRYSTEXXA®. Patients will be randomized 1:1 to receive treatment with SEL-212 or KRYSTEXXA® for 6 months. Efficacy assessments, as measured by serum uric acid (SUA) levels, will be conducted at intervals that are appropriate to determine treatment effect differences. Safety will be monitored throughout the study.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a randomized, parallel-arm, multicenter study to compare the safety and efficacy profiles of SEL-212 and KRYSTEXXA®. Patients will be randomized 1:1 to receive treatment with SEL-212 [a combination of pegadricase (SEL-037) and ImmTOR (SEL-110)] or KRYSTEXXA® for 6 months.
Study patients in the SEL-212 arm will receive study drug every 28 days for a total of up to 6 infusions of SEL-212. Study patients in the KRYSTEXXA® arm will receive study drug according to the manufacturer's prescribing information, i.e., every 14 days for a total of up to 12 infusions of KRYSTEXXA®.
Efficacy assessments, as measured by SUA levels, will be conducted at intervals that are appropriate to determine treatment effect differences. Safety will be monitored throughout the study.

study_design_info.masking_description: Assessments of qualitative endpoints will be conducted on an assessor-blinded basis.

primary_outcome.description: To assess the change in serum uric acid (SUA) in patients treated with SEL-212 compared to KRYSTEXXA®

secondary_outcome.description: Comparison between patients treated with SEL-212 or KRYSTEXXA® for control of serum uric acid concentration.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison between patients treated with SEL-212 or KRYSTEXXA® for changes in health questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study Questionnaire Short Form 36 Health Survey (SF-36)

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison between patients treated with SEL-212 or KRYSTEXXA® for changes in number of tender joints
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in number of tender joints per patient

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison between patients treated with SEL-212 or KRYSTEXXA® for changes in number of swollen joints
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in number of swollen joints per patient

arm_group.description: IV infusion of SEL-212 every 28 days for a total of up to 6 infusions of SEL-212.
IV infusion of KRYSTEXXA® according to the manufacturer's prescribing information every 14 days for a total of up to 12 infusions of KRYSTEXXA®.

intervention.description: SEL-037, PEGylated uric acid specific enzyme (uricase)
KRYSTEXXA®, PEGylated uric acid specific enzyme (uricase)
